result.execSummary:
The defendant Alvaro Hernandez was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal) - 2nd Offense, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Bond previously posted in the amount of $250 has been applied. Remaining costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal) - 2nd Offense

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Alvaro Hernandez

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Alvaro Hernandez
Current: N5350 State Road 73, Almond, WI 54909 United States  (Effective: 03-10-2016)
Prior: W1573 Aspen Ave, Pine River, WI 54965

15CM484 & 16CM86 Cases called @ 3:03 p.m. Defendant Alvaro Hernandez in court. Enrique Soria present to interpret. Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. 16CM86 -   Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Complaint given to the defendant by ADA Anderson. The Court reads the complaint to the defendant.  Advised of right of Counsel. Defendant waives his right to counsel and wishes to enter a plea on all pending cases. Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court. Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea: 15CM484: Ct 1 - Guilty. 16CM86: Ct 1 - Guilty. Court accepts plea and enters JOC. 16CM86: Cts 2 & 3 - DRI. 15TR3244, 15TR3245, 16TR558 & 16TR577 - DRI. Sentencing argument by ADA Anderson. No statement by DE. Court orders: 15CM484 - Costs w/ 60 DTP or PP, DNA sample and surcharge. 16CM86 - 28 days WC Jail - Huber, GT, No CFTS - Sentence to commence by no later than 3/15/2016, $1618 fine inclusive of costs w/ 60 DTP or PP, $42.50 blood draw costs, 16 mo DL revocation/16 mo IID, DNA Sample and Surcharge. Defendant advised of right to expunge DNA record through the Department of Justice. Bond previously posted to be applied. Spanish appeal rights given.
No operation of any motor vehicles whatsoever.

Case Called @ 3:00 PM: Defendant Alvaro Hernandez in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Gregory Morales also appears with Defendant to aid the Court with Interpreting.  Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.  Advised of right of Counsel.  Def does not wish counsel for these proceedings and wishes to resolve matter with a GP.   NGP entered by Court as to all matters.   Court orders $250 Cash Bond w/conditions.  P/S Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 8, 2016 at 03:00 pm.

citations.chargeDescr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
